snippet: Chinese authorities confirmed that 22 people on the test voyage of a tugboat on the Yangtze River had died.
abstract: Tugboat capsizes in eastern China during test run, killing 22 people.
lead_paragraph: Chinese authorities confirmed that 22 people on the test voyage of a tugboat on the Yangtze River had died.

headline.main: Boat Accident in East China Kills 22 People
headline.print_headline: Tugboat on Test Run Capsizes, Killing 22 People in East China
